Description: 2019GIBSONLES PAUL JUNIOR DCTRIBUTE - BLUE STAINHi and thanks for looking.This is a great guitar that is nearly new.Classic Gibson tone and playability.There are NO cracks,breaks or repairs to this guitar.It plays great and comes with all the original paperwork including a Only a Gibson is Good Enough bumper sticker.Strings have been changed once.Pickguard shows light scratches.One small hair like string scratch by a tuning post.The gigbag does smell a little smokey from being played out a couple of times but is new enough so that it should air out pretty easily.Includes the original shipping carton.The big catalog store is currently sold out of this color. From The Web: Strap on the Gibson Les Paul Junior Tribute Doublecut solidbody electric guitar and experience a primal instrument that's primed for rock 'n' roll. The Les Paul Junior Tribute pays homage to one of the 1950s' most beloved guitars. From its single P-90 pickup to its SlimTaper neck profile to its simple-yet-sturdy hardware, you'll love the instantly recognizable LP single-cutaway design and vintage vibe.This Les Paul Junior Tribute Doublecut puts a classic in your hands.Double cutaway mahogany slab bodyGibson built the Les Paul Junior Tribute with one thing in mind: to deliver the feel, sound, and vibe of a genuine LP Junior to your hands. This axe features a premium-quality mahogany slab body that retains the distinctive Les Paul shape. The nickel-plated wraparound bridge anchors your strings to the body for great sustain, proving that sometimes simple is better. It's the perfect example of a purpose-built instrument.One P-90 pickup in the bridge positionYou won't be able to get enough of the Les Paul Junior Tribute Doublecut's lone single-coil P-90 pickup. Plug the Les Paul Junior Tribute into your favorite amp and prepare to be astounded by the sound. The pickup straddles the perfect line between single-coil clarity and humbucker power. Yet, when cranked, it screams with a midrange snarl all its own.SlimTaper neck feels great and provides exceptional playabilityThis Gibson Junior sports a comfortable, fast-action neck with a SlimTaper profile. As your fingers moved down this neck, the precisely controlled width-to-thickness ratio of the Firebird's SlimTaper neck offers a consistent, fast, and comfortable feel. It's no wonder many life-long guitar players consider the SlimTaper Gibson's finest neck.Gibson Les Paul Junior Tribute Solidbody Electric Guitar Features:Reproduction of the straightforward Les Paul Junior TributeSingle P-90 chimes and snarls with the bestGreat sustain and midrange character, thanks to premium mahogany slab bodyMaple neck with SlimTaper profile for comfortable playabilitySimple hardware for authentic looks and feel plus great tuning stabilityTech SpecsBody Type:SolidbodyBody Shape:Junior Les Paul DoublecutLeft-/Right-handed:Right-handedNumber of Strings:6Body Material:MahoganyBody Finish:Nitrocellulose LacquerColor:Blue StainNeck Material:MapleNeck Shape:Slim TaperRadius:12"Fingerboard Material:RosewoodFingerboard Inlay:Acrylic DotsNumber of Frets:22, MediumScale Length:24.75"Nut Width:1.695"Nut Material:TektoidBridge/Tailpiece:Compensated WraparoundTuners:Vintage DeluxeBridge Pickup:P-90 Single-coilControls:1 x volume, 1 x toneCase Included:Gig BagPlease Read:PAYMENT:Verified Authorized Ebay payments that include a Confirmed address.You must contact me before using any other source of payment.SHIPPING : is US Postal Service Insured.USA SHIPPING ONLY : $49.99 or less depending on your location.This covers USPS ground to the West Coast or Priority if closer.Email for an exact quote.Thanks for looking and check out my other listings.
